text: Although the plot of Shadow Hearts I + Covenant is far superior, I prefer FtNW regarding to others aspects including music. In Covenant, "The Fate", "The Past" and "Alice Theme" are very good tracks, but the dungeons and battle themes of FtNW excels.

author: Serafini Gaunt
Jimbobob5536

text: @CannibalusTrollamus Yeah! I miss RPGS like this! I don't like how everyone wants all this real time battles in all rpgs now. They're not as fun, especially when you can't use awesome and unique battle systems like this game had. I had fun playing games where you had to plan and strategize your battles. All the new games are way too easy now compared to old rpgs. I guess people are just too lazy to get the hang of random battles and intricate, yet fun systems.
author: Davina

text: @CannibalusTrollamus She's not too hard if you keep at her stock constantly, and make sure your characters are always at least near max health. I was at level 58 the first time I beat the game, and I didn't find her too hard.
